summary: While Damian Wayne struggles to cope with Batman's no-killing rule, he soon starts to believe that his destiny lies within a secret society known as, The Court of Owls.
cast: Stuart Allan|Troy Baker|Kevin Conroy|Trevor Devall|Robin Atkin Downes|Griffin Gluck|Grey Griffin|Sean Maher|David McCallum|Jason O'Mara|Peter Onorati|Andrea Romano|Jeremy Sisto|'Weird Al' Yankovic
keywords: superhero|dc comics|based on comic book|father son relationship|shared universe
title: Batman vs. Robin
